(47465, 50212).description: The Australian Community Climate and Earth-System Simulator, a climate model used for simulating and predicting climate patterns

(49654, 51869).name: CMIP5
(49654, 51869).label: project
(49654, 51869).description: The Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 5, a framework for comparing different climate models to improve climate predictions

(49654, 51869).name: ocean models
(49654, 51869).label: model
(49654, 51869).description: Computational representations of ocean processes used to simulate and predict ocean currents, temperature, and other ocean properties

(49654, 51869).name: coupled climate simulations
(49654, 51869).label: experiment
(49654, 51869).description: Climate simulations that integrate multiple components of the Earth's system, such as atmosphere, ocean, and land, to study their interactions and feedbacks

(49654, 51869).name: wind stress changes
(49654, 51869).label: variable
(49654, 51869).description: Changes in the force exerted by wind on the ocean surface, influencing ocean currents and circulation patterns

(49654, 51869).name: MOC cells
(49654, 51869).label: variable
(49654, 51869).description: Meridional Overturning Circulation cells, which represent the movement of water in the ocean from the surface to the deep ocean and back to the surface

(49654, 51869).name: ACC region
(49654, 51869).label: location
(49654, 51869).description: The Antarctic Circumpolar Current region, a critical area for global ocean circulation and climate regulation

(49654, 51869).name: eddy responses
(49654, 51869).label: variable
(49654, 51869).description: The response of ocean eddies, which are rotating water masses, to changes in wind stress or other external forcing

(49654, 51869).name: atmospheric components
(49654, 51869).label: model
(49654, 51869).description: Computational representations of atmospheric processes used to simulate and predict weather and climate patterns

(49654, 51869).name: land components
(49654, 51869).label: model
(49654, 51869).description: Computational representations of land processes used to simulate and predict land surface conditions and interactions with the atmosphere

(49654, 51869).name: sea ice components
(49654, 51869).label: model
(49654, 51869).description: Computational representations of sea ice processes used to simulate and predict sea ice coverage and interactions with the ocean and atmosphere

(49654, 51869).name: Australian Research Council
(49654, 51869).label: provider
(49654, 51869).description: A government agency responsible for funding research in Australia, including climate and environmental research
